Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hilton London Olympia in London (Kensington), you'll be minutes from Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre and close to Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star hotel is close to Imperial College London and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 405 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. This hotel has 12 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Holland Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kensington Roof Gardens - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Broadway Shopping Centre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Hammersmith Apollo - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Shepherd's Bush Empire - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Riverside Studios - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Westfield London Shopping Centre - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Stamford Bridge Stadium - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Imperial College London - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Albert Memorial - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
London Natural History Museum - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Electric Cinema - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
London (LCY-London City) - 17.7 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton London Olympia is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

London (LGW-Gatwick) - 38 km / 23.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton London Olympia is London (LHR-Heathrow).
